Person
Movie

Person
	movieRoles
		cast
			character
			movie
		crew
			job
			movie
Movie
	roles
		cast
			character
			person
		crew
			job
			person


Person
	credits:
		cast: Array<PersonCast>
		crew: Array<PersonCrew>

Movie:
	credits:
		cast: Array<MovieCast>
		crew: Array<MovieCrew>

Cast:
	character
	order
Crew:
	job
	department

MovieCast : Cast
	movie

MovieCrew : Crew
	movie

PersonCast : Cast
	person

PersonCrew : Crew
	person
